title: Not getting any key drops
body: Since the new update I've been getting almost no keys. I've played for the past four or five days straight, and only gotten two key fragments. I'm Honor 2, is this really how frequent drops should be?

replies.body: In other words, it's not really how often you play now, but how honorable you are. Playing more games will in the end raise your honor up and then you'll get more drops.

Key fragments drops are meant to be mostly evenly spread throughout the 28 day cycle that they drop in. No worries just yet, as long as you stay [**honorable **](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115008474148) you'll be seeing more fragments drop soon!

Yeah, I got like 3 most honorable player the past week and I logged on today to find 4 key fragments. As long as you aren't toxic and get honored once in awhile you should get some key fragments I would assume{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
